content: time to use up those scraps with this quick and easy headband it easily can be adjusted to fit any size with a chart included this is a beginning pattern and only uses chains and puff stitches i created this as a challenge to use up my stash of partial skeins that i have laying around i would love to see your finished work make sure you leave a picture you are free to sell anything made from this pattern but please give me credit @studiosavalle for the pattern
